title: Playback of online music or videos is slow
answer:
The Wi-Fi network is unstable.

If you are connected to a Wi-Fi network, please check whether the phone is within range or contact the Wi-Fi network provider.

The mobile network signal is weak.

If you are connected to a mobile network, please try again in an area with a stronger signal.

The phone's internal storage is insufficient.

If your phone features Phone Manager, please go to Phone Manager and select Storage cleaner or Phone accelerator. Then follow the on-screen prompts to clear the application cache, residual system files, infrequently used apps and installation packages, videos, compressed files and other large files.

If online playback is slow in the browser, try again using a different browser.

If online playback is slow when using an app, please try again after updating or reinstalling the app.
keywords: online, playback, music, videos, songs, choppy
